price: 57. Of hij zou zeggen: “Als Allah mij maar had geleid, dan zou ik zeker onder de godvrezenden zijn.”
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
